title: Rick & Morty
synopsis: An animated series that follows the exploits of a super scientist and his not so bright grandson.

title: Futurama
synopsis: Fry, a pizza guy, is accidentally frozen in 1999 and thawed out New Year's Eve 2999.

title: Archer
synopsis: Covert black ops and espionage take a back seat to zany personalities and relationships between secret agents and drones.

title: Invader Zim
synopsis: An eccentric alien invader intent on bringing down the human race is foiled at every turn by an equally eccentric and possibly insane paranormal researcher.

title: South Park
synopsis: Follows the misadventures of four irreverent grade-schoolers in the quiet, dysfunctional town of South Park, Colorado.

title: SpongeBob SquarePants
synopsis: The series chronicles the adventures and endeavors of SpongeBob and his various friends in the underwater city of Bikini Bottom.

title: King of the Hill
synopsis: A straight laced propane salesman in Arlen, Texas tries to deal with the wacky antics of his family and friends, while also trying to keep his son in line.

title: The Simpsons
synopsis: The satiric adventures of a working-class family in the misfit city of Springfield.

title: Bugs Bunny Show
synopsis: An iconic series of comedy short films revolving around the life and times of Bugs Bunny and various other characters in the Looney Tunes universe.

title: Family Guy
synopsis: In a wacky Rhode Island town, a dysfunctional family strive to cope with everyday life as they are thrown from one crazy scenario to another.
